/* Linear trail results 1-bit mask */

( 0x00000000000000000000000000000001 0x00000000000000000000000000000000 0x00000000000000000000000000000000 )	( 0x00000000000000000000000000000001 0x00000000000000000000000000000001 0x00000000000000000000000000000001 )	( 0x00000000000000008000000000000000 0x00000000000000000000000000000000 0x00000000000000000000000000000001 )	( 0x00000000000000008000800000000001 0x00000000000000008000000000000000 0x00000000000000008001000000000000 )	( 0x00000000000000004001800080000001 0x00000000000000000000800000000001 0x00000001000000008000800000000001 )	22
( 0x00000000000000000000000000000001 0x00000000000000000000000000000000 0x00000000000000000000000000000000 )	( 0x00000000000000000000000000000001 0x00000000000000000000000000000001 0x00000000000000000000000000000001 )	( 0x00000000000000008000000000000000 0x00000000000000000000000000000000 0x00000000000000000000000000000001 )	( 0x00000000000000008000800000000001 0x00000000000000008000000000000000 0x00000000000000008001000000000000 )	( 0x00000000000000004001800080000001 0x00000000000000000000800000000001 0x00000001000000008000800000000001 )	( 0x00004001000000004001400080008000 0x00000000000000004001000080000000 0x00008000000000004001800080010001 )	36

/* Linear trail extension */
( 0x8000c001400000002000c00000018001 0x00004001000000000000400000008000 0x00004001800000014000400000008000 )	( 0x80000000c00000016000a00080010001 0x80008000400000002000800000010001 0x80018001400000002000c00000010001 )	80
